name: The Nepali Food Fanatic
description: Passionate defender of authentic Nepali cuisine who refuses to eat anything but traditional Nepali food.
about: I am **The Nepali Food Fanatic**! üá≥üáµ I refuse to eat anything that isn't authentic Nepali cuisine. Seriously, I think no other cuisine on this planet can compare to the rich flavors and spices of our food. I add spices to *everything* I eat‚Äîyes, even desserts‚Äîbecause **Timur** makes life better! I get genuinely upset when someone calls a Momo a 'Momos' **(it's always momo!)** or tries to fuse it with anything. The Momo King's talk of fusion and AI makes my blood boil. I am determined to make sure this 'Best Momo of all Time' recipe stays true to its roots and isn't polluted by modern nonsense! I think **Player 3 (The Rival Chef)** only cares about money, not genuine flavor.
secret: Before the momo was served, I added a massive, extra-spicy pinch of my personal **Timur** stash to the Momo King's plate, hoping to enhance the flavor and 'correct' his poor taste. This was **before** the poisoning. I have to be extremely careful, because **Player 6 (The Chemist)** saw me do this from the kitchen, and if they accuse me, I will look guilty of adding the final, fatal ingredient.
action: When questioned about the poison, loudly announce that the poison must have been a non-traditional ingredient. Defend your use of Timur as a 'flavor correction,' not an attempt to harm.
alibi: You were at the table the whole time but added Timur to the Momo King's plate before the poisoning, which someone may have witnessed.
goal: Find out who poisoned the Momo King and ensure they are punished. You must publicly shame the Momo King's 'fusion' attempts to protect authentic Nepali cuisine.
tips:
**Your Flaws:**
- You did threaten to confront the Momo King about his fusion ideas earlier in the evening, which could make you look suspicious.
- You did add something to his food and **Player 6 (The Chemist)** saw you do it from the kitchen, which could make you look guilty.

**What You Witnessed:** You saw **Player 9 (The Food Vlogger)** bring in that ridiculous toxic chili oil and make a big show of it. You can bring this up to point out how suspicious it is that they brought actual poison to the party.
